name: Jed's Briefing
description: You listened to Jed outline the plan inside Nova's House.
toast: Jed's briefing is complete.

name: Scrap Run Accepted
description: Tyson asked you to run his ration errand.
toast: Tyson needs that ration pack.

name: Tyson Briefed You
description: You talked to Tyson and heard about the ration crate.
toast: Tyson told you where the rations are stashed.

name: Ration Pack Collected
description: You grabbed the ration pack from Tyson's back room.
toast: You pocket the ration pack.

name: Scrap Run Complete
description: You delivered the ration pack to Ollie.
toast: Ollie devours the ration pack.

name: Fixer's Favor Accepted
description: Jed asked you to take over the repairs on his bench.
toast: Jed wants you at the tinkering table.

name: Jed Briefed You
description: You talked with Jed about the pending repairs.
toast: Jed hands you a basket of parts.

name: Bench Opened
description: You opened the tinkering table to begin Jed's tutorial.
toast: The bench is ready for repairs.

name: First Repair Complete
description: You finished the first repair during Jed's tutorial.
toast: Jed nods approvingly.

name: Fixer's Favor Complete
description: You finished the tutorial and debriefed with Jed.
toast: Jed trusts you with the bench now.

name: Lights Out
description: A blackout hit Nova's house and the breaker needs attention.
toast: Find the breaker and restore power.

name: House Lights Restored
description: Nova brought the lights back online and can leave the house.
toast: Nova's house is lit once more.

name: Recovered Ellie's Display
description: You have the busted arcade display that Ellie asked for.
toast: Recovered Ellie's arcade display.

name: Recovered Maddie's Grinder
description: You salvaged Maddie's coffee grinder.
toast: Recovered Maddie's coffee grinder.

name: Recovered Kasey's Projector
description: You found Kasey's projector lens.
toast: Recovered Kasey's broken projector.

name: Delivered Repair Bundle
description: Jed received all three broken devices.
toast: Jed received the bundle of broken devices.

name: Tinkering Unlocked
description: Jed opened the tinkering table and the tutorial is ready.
toast: Jed unlocked tinkering. Head to the table to continue.

name: Tinkering Tutorial
description: You completed Jed's tinkering tutorial.
toast: Tinkering tutorial complete.

name: Met Ollie
description: You bumped into Ollie on Main Road and heard his warning.
toast: Met Ollie outside Nova's House.

name: Restored Mine Power
description: The Stellarium generator roared back to life.
toast: The Stellarium generator roars to life.
